animal.question: I meow and purr, and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐾 I have soft paws and whiskers.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail, and love to fetch sticks. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I'm a loyal companion.
🎾 I enjoy playing fetch.

animal.question: I quack and swim, and sometimes waddle on land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds and plants.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌧️ I love playing in puddles

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass in the field.
🐄 I am often found on farms.
🥛 I produce a white liquid that many people drink.

animal.question: I'm a big cat with a mane. I am known as the king of the jungle, who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am very powerful.
🦁 I am tawny in color.
🥩 I eat meat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and I live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My pattern helps me hide in the tall grass.
🐎 I look a little like a horse.
🌿 I eat plants.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐇 I'm known for being fast.
🌱 I live in burrows.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell, I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I love to eat lettuce.
🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🏠 I can hide in my shell if I am scared.

animal.question: I'm a nocturnal bird known for my silent flight and 'hoo-hoo' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I have big, round eyes.
🌙 I hunt at night.
🐭 I like to eat small rodents.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love sweet things. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet and yummy.
🌸 I visit flowers to collect nectar.
🐝 I am often black and yellow.

bug.question: I hop around and eat plants. I am usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love eating grass.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.
🦗 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. I am considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I help gardeners by eating other bugs.
⚫ I have a shiny shell.
🍎 My colors are similar to an apple.

bug.question: I build tunnels underground and live in a colony. I am very strong for my size. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I work together with my family.
🏠 We live in a hill.
💪 I can carry things much heavier than myself.

bug.question: I can light up the night with my abdomen. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow in the dark.
🌃 I am active at night.
💡 My light helps me find a friend.

bug.question: I go through metamorphosis, starting as a caterpillar and ending with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I emerge from a chrysalis.
🦋 I can fly and drink nectar.

bug.question: I have long, delicate wings and big eyes. I often live near water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can be found near lakes and ponds.
👁️ I have excellent eyesight.
💨 I am a fast flyer.

bug.question: I am known for my sticky webs that I use to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I spin silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
Fly is my favorite snack.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, often blending in with leaves and sticks. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I resemble a part of a tree.
🌿 I'm good at camouflage.
🧍 I am long and thin.

bug.question: I am a predator known for my praying stance. I patiently wait for my prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I hold my front legs in a special way.
🦗 I eat other insects.
🍃 My colour often helps me hide in green leaves
